 Past projects 

<meta charset="UTF-8" />The aim of the 
UNIVERSEH
 Extended for Ukraine project was to include partner universities from Ukraine in the 
activities of the European University UNIVERSEH
 alliance and to strengthen the existing cooperation in the area of New Space, with particular emphasis on improving students' competences, mobility and multilingualism. 

more info...

Beyond UNIVERSEH is a project accepted by the European Commission under the Horizon 2020 “Science with and for Society (SwafS)“ programme. “Beyond UNIVERSEH” complemented and supported the Research and Innovation dimension of the European Space University UNIVERSEH.
